page.title: 03EDUCATION
page.content: {FACTS FROM A TEIGNMOUTH SCHOOL} {TYPE}:Primary, 5-11, R.C. Voluntary Aided. No. of pupils: 169, classes:5, teachers:6, dinner ladies:4, assistant:1, av. class:34 {UNIFORM}: Girls: white blouse, green skirt, tie, cardigan, grey socks, green/white striped summer dress. Boys: grey shirt, socks, short trousers, green blazer. {TYPICAL DAY}:9.05 bell; 9.20 assembly;9.30 Maths, Reading; 10.40 playtime;10.55 English writing; 12.00 lunch; 13.20 Science T.V.&follow-up; 14.35 playtime;14.50 sport;15.40 home. {YEAR COMPUTER AND VIDEO BOUGHT:1984} No. of school meals:75 - pack lunch 94 {FAVOURITE SCHOOL MEAL}: hot dogs, spaghetti rings,chips,jam doughnuts. {LEAST FAVOURITE}: macaroni cheese, baked beans,rice pudding. No. in Infants 1 from playgroup:18,nursery:18
